comments.text:
The following probes are set to expire in Firefox 78:

* FX_PICTURE_IN_PICTURE_WINDOW_OPEN_DURATION (histogram)
* pictureinpicture.opened_method (Scalar) 
* pictureinpicture.closed_method (Scalar)

We'd like to renew these for another 6 months to measure user interest in Picture-in-Picture.
comments.author: mconley@mozilla.com
